channel.title: Alpha+ buy-in: COMING SOON for $9.99
channel.description: Coming Soon. Teaser: **¿What about PayPal?** At first (while we manually hand out keys), **yes -** PayPal will be accepted. Later, we will temporarily remove PayPal (once we have auto-distributed keys ready with our card system). Later later, PayPal will return once we also have that setup with our key-distribution system. **What about at release?** Steam is awesome, however the developers save money when purchased a Steam key _from our site_ instead of Steam: This means that, currently, the "bonus" for purchasing from our site is Alpha/Beta access. Upon release, the bonus will likely be switched to some extra gp if purchased from our site instead of Steam.

item.title: Alpha+ buy-in: COMING SOON for $9.99
item.dc:creator: í42-Xblade
item.description:
Coming Soon. Teaser:

¿What about PayPal?
At first (while we manually hand out keys), yes - PayPal will be accepted.

Later, we will temporarily remove PayPal (once we have auto-distributed keys ready with our card system).

Later later, PayPal will return once we also have that setup with our key-distribution system.

What about at release?

Steam is awesome, however the developers save money when purchased a Steam key from our site instead of Steam: This means that, currently, the “bonus” for purchasing from our site is Alpha/Beta access. Upon release, the bonus will likely be switched to some extra gp if purchased from our site instead of Steam.
